place.name: ABERLOUR
place.gazetteerText: Aberlour, par. and vil. with ry. sta., SW. Banffshire, 2¼ miles SW. of Craigellachie junction, 14,781 ac., pop. 1912; P.O., T.O., 2 Banks. (In 1887, John Bartholomew's Gazetteer of the British Isles)
